name: hmoon-agents
description: Custom GitHub Copilot chat participants for H-Moon Hydro migration pipeline

chatParticipants.name: health-auditor
chatParticipants.description: Score products and generate prioritized enrichment tasks

chatParticipants.name: pos-matcher
chatParticipants.description: Align POS inventory to Shopify variants with fuzzy matching

chatParticipants.name: brand-normalizer
chatParticipants.description: Detect and normalize brand names from 250+ registry

chatParticipants.name: category-classifier

chatParticipants.name: safe-operator
chatParticipants.description: Execute Shopify mutations with dry-run guardrails

chatParticipants.name: variant-consolidator
chatParticipants.description: Convert WooCommerce grouped to Shopify multi-variant

chatParticipants.name: theme-helper
chatParticipants.description: Assist with Shopify Horizon theme development

chatParticipants.name: repo-archeologist
chatParticipants.description: Index existing tooling to prevent redundant work

chatParticipants.name: compliance-auditor
chatParticipants.description: Final gate for Shopify compliance and accessibility
